channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Generate Images
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Generate Images

item.title: CVE-2024-6724|2024-08-13T14:26:06.464Z -- unknown -- generate%20images
item.description: The Generate Images WordPress plugin before 5.2.8 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-6724|2024-08-13T06:00:02.297Z -- unknown -- generate%20images
item.description: The Generate Images WordPress plugin before 5.2.8 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
